00036 class RunLocation : public LCGenericObjectImplExt {
00037 
00038 public: 
00039   RunLocation(){};
00040 
00051   RunLocation(LCObject* obj) : LCGenericObjectImplExt(obj) {}; 
00052   
00056   RunLocation &  setRunLocationParameters(std::string location, std::string runtype, std::string monthinfo) 
00057   {
00058     //obj()->setIntVal(kRunLocationIntLocation, atoi(location.c_str());
00059     obj()->setIntVal(kStartIndexRunLocationInt, kNRunLocationInts);
00060     UInt_t nextindex = convertStringToInts(obj(), location, kNRunLocationInts, kLengthIndexRunLocationInt);
00061     obj()->setIntVal(kStartIndexRunTypeInt, nextindex);
00062     nextindex = convertStringToInts(obj(), runtype, nextindex, kLengthIndexRunTypeInt);    
00063     obj()->setIntVal(kStartIndexMonthInfo, nextindex);
00064     nextindex = convertStringToInts(obj(), monthinfo, nextindex, kLengthIndexMonthInfo);    
00065     _obj=obj();
00066     return *this;
00067   };
00068 
00070   std::string getLocation() const
00071   {
00072     return getStringFromInts(_obj, getIntVal(kStartIndexRunLocationInt), kLengthIndexRunLocationInt);
00073   };
00074 
00075 
00077   std::string getGenericRunType() const
00078   {
00079     return getStringFromInts(_obj, getIntVal(kStartIndexRunTypeInt), kLengthIndexRunTypeInt);
00080   };
00081 
00082 
00084   std::string getMonthInfo() const
00085   {
00086     return getStringFromInts(_obj, getIntVal(kStartIndexMonthInfo), kLengthIndexMonthInfo);
00087   };
00088 
00089 
00090 
00091   std::string getConditionsFolder() const {
00092     std::string folder = "/cd_calice_";
00093     if ( getLocation() == "Desy" ) folder += "beam";
00094     else if ( getLocation() == "Cern" ) folder += "cernbeam";
00095     else if ( getLocation() == "Fnal" ) folder += "fnalbeam";
00096     else if ( getLocation() == "DesyTent" ) folder += "tent";
00097     else if ( getLocation() == "DesyLab" ) folder += "desylab";
00098     return folder;
00099   }
00100 
00101 
00102   std::string getConverterFolder( const std::string convVersion ) const {
00103     std::string folder = "/cd_calice_v";
00104     folder += convVersion;
00105     folder += "_";
00106     folder += getGenericRunType();
00107     return folder;
00108   }
